text: Henrik Ripa (14 May 1968 – 12 July 2020) was a Swedish politician. He was a member of the Swedish Parliament from 2010 to 2014. Ripa represented the northern constituency of Västra Götaland. Between 1998 and 2010 he was chairman of the municipality of Lerum. Ripa died on 12 July 2020, aged 52.Sahlgrenskas styrelseorförande Henrik Ripa har avlidit ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swedish politicians
title: Henrik Ripa
